public ref class NetworkInformationPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type NetworkInformationPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.

span.span: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限用于保护数据中的类返回命名空间。This permission is used to secure data returned by the classes in the namespace. 声明性安全，对于使用类。For declarative security, use the class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有不受限制的权限的对象。The following example creates an unrestricted permission object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述它们都共同点描述的状态的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they both describe in common. 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建是现有的权限对象的交集的权限对象。The following example creates a permission object that is the intersection of existing permission objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定完全包含在指定权限的状态，则当前的权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 如果此方法返回 true，则当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns true, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个权限之间的子集关系。The following code example displays the subset relationship between two permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回通过当前权限和指定的权限表示表示的所有状态的权限。The method returns a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个权限对象，是现有的权限对象的联合。The following example creates a permission object that is the union of existing permission objects.
